description: This file serves as the server-side rendering (SSR) entry point for a Qwik application, responsible for rendering the app outside the browser environment, supporting various deployment scenarios such as Express, Cloudflare, or static builds. It imports rendering functions, a manifest, and a root component to produce a server stream.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Main SSR entry function that renders the root component to a stream with provided options and configuration.
